mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation(employee_no, meetingroom_name, reservation_date, start_time, end_date, reservation_detail, re_num) VALUES (#{employeeNo}, #{mettingRoomName}, #{reserveDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{usePurpose, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq_re_num.nextval)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT r.meetingroom_name, r.start_time, r.end_date, r.reservation_date, r.employee_no, r.re_num FROM meetingroom m, reservation r, employee e WHERE r.employee_no = #{employeeNo} AND r.employee_no(+) = e.employee_no AND m.meetingroom_name = r.meetingroom_name ORDER BY reservation_date, start_time) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT m.meetingroom_name, r.start_time, r.end_date, r.reservation_date, r.employee_no, r.re_num FROM meetingroom m, reservation r, employee e WHERE e.employee_no = #{employeeNo} AND r.employee_no(+) = e.employee_no AND m.meetingroom_name = r.meetingroom_name ORDER BY reservation_date, start_time ) countTable
